subject: Hello, This is more notifica
body:
Hello, This is more notification from me as I have tried many times to get you on email and no way. I am re-sending this email here about your abandoned boxes by a shipper from (UN) and these boxes contained money unknown to the shipper and he just abandoned it and ran away.
Now, emailing you concerning the shipment of your Trunk Boxes which will take effect within the next 72hours immediately the delivery is schedule for the rightful owner.(you)
I am David P. Wilson, Head of Inspection Unit, United Nations Inspection Agency. it was discovered An abandoned shipment through a Diplomat from the United Kingdom and was transferred from JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta
The consignments were declared as personal effects but in actual fact contain raw cash. US currency notes in $100USD are carefully packed and stashed in two trunk boxes. Approximately, 4MillionUSD in each box, and also the Diplomatâ€™s inability to pay for some clearance, like storage clearance, Non inspection fee. These are my discoveries.
I will help you to take care of the Non inspection fee and arrange for the boxes to be moved out of this Airport to your address Once we are in agreement
As you can see I will employ the services of a secure shipping Company/agent that will provide the necessary security that is required to deliver the package to your doorstep to avoid complications.
And What will be my compensation from the funds as you receive them ? I want to know my compensation % before proceeding on this project.
The details of the consignment including your name and email on it where the shipment was tagged as personal effects is with us.
Kindly get back to me for directives on how to receive your boxes without any delay ,Please send your complete information to reconfirm that you are the true rightful person, Full names ........ Address ......Telephone number  .......
Also I have contacted management and I was inform that only what is needed from recipient' is clearance and this will be use for clearance and shipment to your doorstep, we need to act fast to avoid any delay or hindrance, this consignment should have been repatriated  back if not my effort and Director in  Airport whose dim feet to make sure it declare to deliver to the owner for further details.
I wait to hear from you very urgently for a way forward. All communication must be held extremely confidential to avoid complication.
Sincerely,
David P. Wilson.

subject: Re:   Hello, This is more notifica
body:
Hello David P. Wilson,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea about these abandoned boxes. It's really strange that someone would just leave them behind like that. 

You mentioned that the boxes contain raw cash in US currency notes, how did you come to find out about this? And why was it declared as personal effects?

Also, you mentioned some fees like storage clearance and Non-inspection fee. Could you please explain more about these fees? How much are they and why do they need to be paid?

I'm also curious about the secure shipping company agent you mentioned. What kind of security measures do they provide for such deliveries?

As for your share from the funds, I think it's only fair that you get compensated for your efforts. However, I'd like to know more details before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon
